Sentencas: The temperature and thermal stress distributions in a planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) were calculated using a finite element method in order to determine guidelines for the selection of cell materials.
Titulo: THE CALCULATION OF TEMPERATURE AND THERMAL-STRESS DISTRIBUTIONS IN THE PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL

Sentencas: The calculations indicate that the thermal stress is generated in a planar SOFC composed of yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte, a LaMnO3 Cathode, and a Ni-YSZ cermet anode.
Titulo: THE CALCULATION OF TEMPERATURE AND THERMAL-STRESS DISTRIBUTIONS IN THE PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL

Sentencas: The largest stress is generated in the region of the cathode material.
Titulo: THE CALCULATION OF TEMPERATURE AND THERMAL-STRESS DISTRIBUTIONS IN THE PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL

Sentencas: According to the calculations, if the linear expansion of the cathode material is 1.0 X 10(-6)
Titulo: THE CALCULATION OF TEMPERATURE AND THERMAL-STRESS DISTRIBUTIONS IN THE PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL

Sentencas: (the linear expansion of porous LaMnO3 is 2.O X 10(-5)), the thermal stress in the SOFC will be relieved.
Titulo: THE CALCULATION OF TEMPERATURE AND THERMAL-STRESS DISTRIBUTIONS IN THE PLANAR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELL
